Thanks! Formatting is perfect; the linked table of contents is a bonus.
For those who don't already have software, try Adobe Digital Editions (http://www.adobe.com/products/digitaleditions/). It works on Macs and PCs.
Also, you can drag it into your iTunes library to read it in iBooks on an iOS device (assuming you have all of these things).
